item.title: ‘I feel overwhelmed’: I’m a widow in my early 40s with 3 children. I have $330K in IRAs. Will be OK?
I inherited $600K in Apple stock. It now makes up 50% of my portfolio. Is that too risky?
item.description: “I worry that a downturn in the tech sector, or something Apple-specific, could wipe out half my portfolio.”

item.title: The small-business hiring engine is sputtering. Why that’s a red flag for the economy.
item.description: Without small businesses and their hiring, already precarious economic growth could be prone to a pullback.
